title: Radiance Botanical Serum
description: Experience visibly brighter, smoother skin with our Radiance Botanical Serum, a lightweight, plant-powered elixir designed to nourish, hydrate, and restore your skin’s natural glow.
keyBenefits:
• Infused with botanical extracts for deep nourishment
  • Reduces dullness and uneven texture
  • Boosts hydration and skin radiance
  • Lightweight, non-greasy formula ideal for daily use

faqs.question: What skin type is this serum suitable for?
faqs.answer: It’s suitable for all skin types — especially beneficial for dry, dull, or sensitive skin.

faqs.question: How often should I use this serum?
faqs.answer: For best results, use it twice daily — morning and evening — on cleansed skin before moisturizing.

faqs.question: Can I use it alongside other serums or treatments?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can layer it with other serums or treatments. Apply Radiance Botanical Serum first for maximum absorption.

faqs.question: Is this product vegan and cruelty-free?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s made with 100% vegan, plant-based ingredients and is never tested on animals.

faqs.question: Will it help with hyperpigmentation and dullness?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. The botanical extracts are rich in vitamins that target uneven tone and boost your skin’s natural radiance.

faqs.question: Does it leave a greasy finish on the skin?
faqs.answer: Not at all. It has a lightweight, fast-absorbing formula that leaves your skin dewy, not oily.

title: Hydra Dew Moisturizer
description: Replenish your skin’s moisture barrier with our Hydra Dew Moisturizer, a botanical-rich cream that soothes, hydrates, and locks in long-lasting comfort for visibly plump, dewy skin.
keyBenefits:
• Delivers intense, all-day hydration
  • Soothes dryness and irritation with natural plant oils
  • Restores skin elasticity and softness
  • Non-comedogenic formula suitable for all skin types

faqs.question: What skin type is this moisturizer suitable for?
faqs.answer: Hydra Dew Moisturizer is suitable for all skin types, including dry, oily, combination, and sensitive skin.

faqs.question: Can it be used both day and night?
faqs.answer: Yes — its lightweight, nourishing formula makes it perfect for both your morning and evening skincare routines.

faqs.question: Is this moisturizer non-comedogenic?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. It’s designed to deeply hydrate without clogging pores, making it ideal for acne-prone skin too.

faqs.question: Does it leave a sticky or heavy feeling?
faqs.answer: No, the texture is light and absorbs quickly, leaving your skin soft and dewy without any greasy residue.

faqs.question: Can it be layered under makeup?
faqs.answer: Yes — it makes an excellent base for makeup, helping your skin stay hydrated and fresh throughout the day.

faqs.question: Is it free from synthetic fragrances and parabens?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's made with clean, plant-based ingredients and contains no synthetic fragrances, parabens, or harsh chemicals.

title: Clarifying Clay Mask
description: Purify and detoxify your skin with our Clarifying Clay Mask, a gentle, botanical-infused treatment that draws out impurities, balances excess oil, and leaves skin clear and refreshed.
keyBenefits:
• Detoxifies skin by drawing out dirt and pollutants
  • Balances oil production and reduces breakouts
  • Infused with soothing botanicals to calm irritation
  • Leaves skin visibly clearer, smoother, and soft

faqs.question: How often should I use the Clarifying Clay Mask?
faqs.answer: Use it 1-2 times per week for normal to oily skin, and once a week for dry or sensitive skin.

faqs.question: Is this mask suitable for acne-prone skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — its clay and botanical extracts help control excess oil, unclog pores, and reduce breakouts.

faqs.question: How long should I leave the mask on?
faqs.answer: Leave it on for 10-12 minutes or until it begins to dry, then rinse with lukewarm water.

faqs.question: Does it cause dryness after use?
faqs.answer: No — it contains hydrating botanicals that keep your skin balanced and soothed after detoxifying.

faqs.question: Can I use this mask on sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Yes, but limit use to once a week and patch test first, as it’s a deep-cleansing treatment.

faqs.question: Is it free from synthetic colors and parabens?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — it’s made with clean, natural ingredients and free from parabens, synthetic fragrances, and dyes.

faqs.question: Will it tighten pores over time?
faqs.answer: Yes — regular use helps minimize the appearance of pores and refines skin texture.

title: Glow Tonic (Botanical Essence Toner)
description: Refresh and revitalize your skin with our Glow Tonic, a balancing botanical toner that gently refines texture, hydrates, and restores natural radiance.
keyBenefits:
• Balances pH and preps skin for serums and moisturizers
  • Hydrates with natural floral waters and plant extracts
  • Minimizes appearance of pores and uneven texture
  • Leaves skin feeling clean, fresh, and glowing

faqs.question: What skin types is the Glow Tonic suitable for?
faqs.answer: It’s suitable for all skin types, especially combination, dull, or sensitive skin.

faqs.question: Can I use this toner daily?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s gentle enough for daily use, both morning and evening.

faqs.question: Does it contain alcohol?
faqs.answer: No, Glow Tonic is alcohol-free and made with soothing botanical ingredients.

faqs.question: Will it help with minimizing pores?
faqs.answer: Yes — regular use helps tighten and visibly reduce the appearance of pores.

faqs.question: Should I use this before or after serums?
faqs.answer: Apply it immediately after cleansing and before applying serums or moisturizers.

faqs.question: Does it leave a sticky or tight feeling?
faqs.answer: Not at all — it leaves skin feeling refreshed, balanced, and comfortably hydrated.

title: Nourishing Cleansing Balm
description: Melt away makeup and impurities while nourishing your skin with our Nourishing Cleansing Balm, a botanical-rich formula that leaves your complexion soft, supple, and deeply cleansed.
keyBenefits:
• Dissolves makeup, dirt, and sunscreen effectively
  • Infused with nourishing plant oils and butters
  • Leaves skin soft, hydrated, and never stripped
  • Perfect for dry and sensitive skin types

faqs.question: Is this cleansing balm suitable for all skin types?
faqs.answer: Yes — it works for all skin types, especially dry, sensitive, and combination skin.

faqs.question: Can it remove waterproof makeup?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — it effectively melts away waterproof makeup, sunscreen, and excess oil.

faqs.question: How do I use the Nourishing Cleansing Balm?
faqs.answer: Massage a small amount onto dry skin, then emulsify with water and rinse thoroughly.

faqs.question: Will it leave a greasy residue after rinsing?
faqs.answer: No — it transforms into a silky milk when mixed with water, leaving no greasy film behind.

faqs.question: Is it safe for use around the eyes?
faqs.answer: Yes, it’s gentle enough for the delicate eye area, but avoid direct contact with eyes.

faqs.question: Does it contain artificial fragrance or parabens?
faqs.answer: No — it’s formulated with natural botanical oils and is free from synthetic fragrances, parabens, and sulfates.

faqs.question: Can I use it as my only cleanser?
faqs.answer: Yes — it can be used alone or as the first step in a double-cleansing routine.

title: Daily Gentle Foaming Cleanser
description: Start your day with our Daily Gentle Foaming Cleanser, a refreshing, sulfate-free botanical formula that lifts away impurities while keeping skin balanced and hydrated.
keyBenefits:
• Gently removes dirt, excess oil, and makeup
  • Infused with calming plant extracts like aloe and green tea
  • Maintains skin's natural moisture barrier
  • Leaves skin feeling clean, soft, and refreshed

faqs.question: Is this foaming cleanser suitable for sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s sulfate-free and enriched with calming botanicals like aloe and green tea, making it gentle for sensitive skin.

faqs.question: Can I use this cleanser every day?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — it’s designed for daily use, morning and night.

faqs.question: Does it remove makeup effectively?
faqs.answer: Yes — it gently lifts away makeup, dirt, and excess oil without stripping your skin.

faqs.question: Will it dry out my skin?
faqs.answer: No — it’s formulated to maintain your skin’s natural moisture barrier while cleansing.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for acne-prone skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — its soothing and clarifying ingredients help keep pores clean and skin calm.

faqs.question: Is this cleanser free from harsh chemicals?
faqs.answer: Yes — it contains no sulfates, parabens, synthetic fragrances, or dyes.

title: Petal Veil Face Oil
description: Indulge your skin with the delicate touch of our Petal Veil Face Oil, a luxurious botanical blend crafted to soften, nourish, and illuminate for a naturally dewy glow.
keyBenefits:
• Deeply hydrates and nourishes with natural plant oils
  • Boosts skin radiance and elasticity
  • Calms redness and irritation with soothing botanicals
  • Perfect as a final step in your nighttime ritual

faqs.question: Is Petal Veil Face Oil suitable for oily skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s lightweight and fast-absorbing, designed to balance and nourish without clogging pores.

faqs.question: Can I use this oil both day and night?
faqs.answer: While it’s ideal for your nighttime routine, you can also mix a drop with your daytime moisturizer for extra glow.

faqs.question: Does it leave a greasy residue?
faqs.answer: No — it absorbs quickly, leaving skin dewy and soft without an oily finish.

faqs.question: Will it help with dry patches and irritation?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — the blend of calming botanicals soothes irritation and deeply hydrates dry areas.

faqs.question: Is it vegan and cruelty-free?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s 100% vegan, made with plant-based oils, and never tested on animals.

faqs.question: Can it be used with other serums and treatments?
faqs.answer: Yes — apply it as the final step in your routine to lock in moisture and benefits from previous products.

faqs.question: Does it have artificial fragrance or colorants?
faqs.answer: No — it’s scented naturally with pure botanical extracts and contains no synthetic dyes.

title: Under - Eye Renewal Cream
description: Revive and brighten tired eyes with our Under-Eye Renewal Cream, a nourishing botanical blend that targets puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines for a visibly refreshed look.
keyBenefits:
• Reduces the appearance of dark circles and puffiness
  • Hydrates and smoothens the delicate under-eye area
  • Infused with soothing plant extracts like cucumber and chamomile
  • Lightweight, fast-absorbing texture ideal for day and night

faqs.question: Is this eye cream suitable for sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — it's formulated with gentle botanicals like cucumber and chamomile, perfect for delicate under-eye skin.

faqs.question: How often should I use this product?
faqs.answer: For best results, apply twice daily — morning and evening.

faqs.question: Will it reduce dark circles permanently?
faqs.answer: While it brightens and improves appearance over time, consistent use is key for visible, lasting results.

faqs.question: Can it be used under makeup?
faqs.answer: Yes — its lightweight, fast-absorbing texture makes it an ideal base under concealer or foundation.

faqs.question: Does it help with fine lines and wrinkles?
faqs.answer: Yes — its nourishing formula hydrates and smooths fine lines, improving skin texture with regular use.

faqs.question: Is it free from parabens and synthetic fragrances?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — it’s made with clean, botanical ingredients and contains no parabens or artificial fragrances.

title: Blemish Control Spot Treatment
description: Treat blemishes quickly and gently with our Blemish Control Spot Treatment, a fast-acting, botanical-powered formula that reduces redness, calms irritation, and targets breakouts at the source.
keyBenefits:
• Minimizes the appearance of blemishes and breakouts
  • Calms redness and soothes inflamed skin
  • Infused with natural antibacterial plant extracts
  • Non-drying, gentle on sensitive skin

faqs.question: Is this spot treatment suitable for sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s formulated to be gentle, soothing, and non-drying, even on sensitive skin.

faqs.question: How often can I apply this product?
faqs.answer: You can use it 1-3 times a day directly on blemishes until they visibly reduce.

faqs.question: Will it dry out the skin around my blemishes?
faqs.answer: No — it calms and treats breakouts without leaving surrounding skin flaky or irritated.

faqs.question: Does it work on cystic or hormonal acne?
faqs.answer: It’s effective on surface blemishes and redness; for deeper cystic acne, it helps reduce inflammation but should be part of a broader skincare plan.

faqs.question: Can I use it under makeup?
faqs.answer: Yes — allow it to dry completely before applying makeup for best results.

faqs.question: Is it fragrance-free and non-comedogenic?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s fragrance-free, non-comedogenic, and made with clean botanical ingredients.

faqs.question: How quickly will I see results?
faqs.answer: Many users notice reduced redness and inflammation within 12-24 hours of application.

title: Botaniq Gua Sha Tool
description: Elevate your skincare ritual with our handcrafted Botaniq Gua Sha Tool, designed to enhance circulation, relieve tension, and sculpt facial contours naturally.
keyBenefits:
• Promotes lymphatic drainage and reduces puffiness
  • Improves skin elasticity and natural glow
  • Relieves muscle tension in the face and neck
  • Carved from natural stone for a soothing, cooling effect

faqs.question: What is the best way to use a Gua Sha tool?
faqs.answer: Use gentle upward and outward strokes on moisturized skin, starting from the center of your face.

faqs.question: How often should I use the Gua Sha tool?
faqs.answer: For best results, use it 3-5 times a week, though daily use is safe and highly beneficial.

faqs.question: Does it help reduce puffiness?
faqs.answer: Yes — regular use encourages lymphatic drainage and visibly reduces puffiness and swelling.

faqs.question: Can it be used on sensitive skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s suitable for all skin types. Always apply gentle pressure and use a facial oil or serum to avoid pulling.

faqs.question: Is each tool made from natural stone?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — each piece is hand-carved from natural stone, offering a cooling and soothing effect.

faqs.question: Can it help with tension headaches?
faqs.answer: Yes — gently massaging the temples, neck, and jawline with the tool can help relieve facial and neck tension.

title: Rejuvenating Facial Oil Roller
description: Restore your skin’s natural radiance with our Rejuvenating Facial Oil Roller, a luxurious, plant-powered blend designed to hydrate, nourish, and promote a youthful glow on the go.
keyBenefits:
• Delivers deep hydration with nutrient-rich botanical oils
  • Reduces appearance of fine lines and dryness
  • Convenient roller format for targeted application
  • Perfect for travel and mid-day skin refresh

faqs.question: Is this facial oil roller suitable for oily skin?
faqs.answer: Yes — it’s lightweight, fast-absorbing, and balances excess oil while deeply nourishing your skin.

faqs.question: Can I use it over makeup?
faqs.answer: Yes — apply gently on top of makeup to refresh and hydrate your skin throughout the day.

faqs.question: How often should I use the facial oil roller?
faqs.answer: You can use it as needed throughout the day or as part of your morning and evening skincare routines.

faqs.question: Does it help with fine lines?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — its botanical oils help plump and hydrate the skin, softening the appearance of fine lines.

faqs.question: Is it refillable or single-use?
faqs.answer: This is a single-use, sealed roller bottle designed to maintain the purity of its natural oils.

faqs.question: What’s the best area to apply it on the face?
faqs.answer: Focus on dry areas, under the eyes, around fine lines, and anywhere needing a boost of hydration.

faqs.question: Is it scented with synthetic fragrance?
faqs.answer: No — it’s naturally scented with pure botanical oils and contains no artificial fragrances.

title: Botaniq Glow Travel Kit
description: Take your skincare glow wherever you go with our Botaniq Glow Travel Kit, a curated set of mini essentials crafted to keep your skin fresh, hydrated, and radiant on every adventure.
keyBenefits:
• Includes travel-sized skincare favorites
  • Keeps skin nourished and protected while on the move
  • Perfect for weekend getaways and carry-ons
  • Botanical-rich formulas in compact, easy-to-pack sizes

faqs.question: What products are included in the Travel Kit?
faqs.answer: The kit includes mini sizes of our cleanser, toner, facial oil, and moisturizer for a complete routine on the go.

faqs.question: Are the products in the kit suitable for all skin types?
faqs.answer: Yes — every product in the kit is formulated to suit all skin types, including sensitive skin.

faqs.question: Is this kit flight-friendly?
faqs.answer: Absolutely — all products are under 100ml and perfect for carry-on luggage.

faqs.question: Can I refill the mini bottles after use?
faqs.answer: Yes — the containers are reusable, so you can refill them with your full-size favorites.

faqs.question: How long will the travel kit last?
faqs.answer: It typically lasts for a weekend getaway to a full week, depending on usage.

faqs.question: Is it a good option for gifting?
faqs.answer: Definitely — it makes a thoughtful, practical gift for skincare lovers and frequent travelers.
